Summary Note:
Beatriz Vázquez and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Madrid. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Beatriz Vázquez is a 59 year old CEO from Spain.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Beatriz Vázquez and Muñoz have been married since 1991. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Beatriz received her secondary school diploma from Colegio La Inmaculada Córdoba in 1985.
After that, she went on to study at University of the Basque Country until 1989.
Occupation History:
Beatriz Vázquez is a 59 year old CEO from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At Tuenti Technologies S.L., Beatriz Vázquez held the position of Software Developer from 1989 to 1990, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Startup Founder at Amadeus IT Group S.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 1991 to 1992.
She spent 33 years working as a CEO at Tuenti Technologies S.L., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1040000 EUR.
She owns townhouse in Almería, where she resides. It is worth 950000 EUR.

In 2014, she received an inheritance of 2380000 EUR from her late grandfather, who was a prominent Stock Trader, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Beatriz as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
